picture.posr1: The large lens of the g3 gives better picture quality in low light.

assistance.posr1: Introduction to algorithms 3rd edition is unarguably the best book for learning algorithms and data structures.The description for each topic is very lucid and you won't need any extra assistance to understand the contents.
